description: Manage Azure eventhubs ip-rules in networkruleSet for namespace.

commands.name: az eventhubs namespace network-rule-set ip-rule add
commands.summary: Add a IP-Rule for network rule of namespace.
commands.syntax:
az eventhubs namespace network-rule-set ip-rule add --name
                                                    --resource-group
                                                    [--ip-rule]
examples: az eventhubs namespace network-rule-set ip-rule add --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --ip-rule ip-address=10.0.0.0/24 action=Allow

commands.name: az eventhubs namespace network-rule-set ip-rule remove
commands.summary: Remove Ip-Rule from network rule of namespace.
commands.syntax:
az eventhubs namespace network-rule-set ip-rule remove --name
                                                       --resource-group
                                                       [--ip-rule]
examples: az eventhubs namespace network-rule-set ip-rule remove --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --ip-rule ip-address=10.0.0.0/24
